com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore.request

Class SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.core.events.BaseRequestBuilder<B,C,R>
      • com.b2international.snowowl.core.request.ResourceRequestBuilder<B,C,R>
        • com.b2international.snowowl.core.request.SearchResourceRequestBuilder<B,BranchContext,R>
          • com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore.request.SnomedSearchRequestBuilder<B,R>
            • com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore.request.SnomedComponentSearchRequestBuilder<SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder,SnomedDescriptions>
              • com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore.request.SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestBuilder<BranchContext,SnomedDescriptions>, RevisionIndexRequestBuilder<SnomedDescriptions>

    public final class SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder
extends SnomedComponentSearchRequestBuilder<SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder,SnomedDescriptions>
    Builder class to build requests responsible for searching SNOMED CT descriptions. This class should be instantiated from the corresponding static method on the central SnomedRequests class. Filter methods restrict the results set returned from the search requests; what passes the filters will be returned as part of the pageable resultset.
    Since:
    4.5

      • filterByTerm

        public SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder filterByTerm(java.lang.String termFilter)
        Filters results by matching description terms, using different methods for comparison.

        This filter affects the score of each result. If results should be returned in order of relevance, specify SearchResourceRequest#SCORE as one of the sort fields.

        Parameters:
        termFilter - the expression to match
        Returns:
        this search request builder, for method chaining

      • filterByExactTerm

        public SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder filterByExactTerm(java.lang.String exactTermFilter)
        Filters results by matching description terms, as entered (the comparison is case insensitive and folds non-ASCII characters to their closest equivalent).

        This filter affects the score of each result. If results should be returned in order of relevance, specify SearchResourceRequest#SCORE as one of the sort fields.

        Parameters:
        termFilter - the expression to match
        Returns:
        this search request builder, for method chaining

      • createSearch

        protected SearchResourceRequest<BranchContext,SnomedDescriptions> createSearch()
        Specified by:
        createSearch in class SearchResourceRequestBuilder<SnomedDescriptionSearchRequestBuilder,BranchContext,SnomedDescriptions>

      • getLanguageRefSetIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLanguageRefSetIds(java.util.List<ExtendedLocale> locales)
        Extracts the language reference set identifier from the specified list of ExtendedLocales.

        The identifiers may come from the value itself, if it includes a reference set ID (eg. en-x-12345678901), or from the language tag part, if it is well known (eg. en-US).

        If no element from the input list can be converted, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown; no exception occurs if only some of the ExtendedLocales could not be transformed into a language reference set identifier, however.

        Parameters:
        locales - the extended locale list to process (may not be null)
        Returns:
        the converted language reference set identifiers
